description: Configuration for in-game factions and the members of the factions.

name.description: Faction names can be any non-blank string of ascii characters.

color.description: Faction colors are hexidecimal, in the form RRGGBB(AA).

disposition.description: The opinion of the faction towards the player. Positive is friendly, negative is hostile. Faction will attack player when disposition < 0.

ships.description: The list of ships in this faction.

items.description: The string Id of this ship. Can be any sequence of basic alphanumeric characters without a space.
